text: My attitude to peace is rather based on the Burmese definition of peace - it really means removing all the negative factors that destroy peace in this world. So peace does not mean just putting an end to violence or to war, but to all other factors that threaten peace, such as discrimination, such as inequality, poverty.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

text: When we take our eyes off the whirl of day-to-day activity and concentrate on honoring Him and following in His way, we find a consistent peace that carries us through both plenty and poverty.
author: Charles Stanley

text: Peace Train is a song I wrote, the message of which continues to breeze thunderously through the hearts of millions of human beings.
author: Cat Stevens

text: Here men from the planet Earth first set foot upon the Moon. July 1969 AD. We came in peace for all mankind.
author: Neil Armstrong

text: He who follows his lessons tastes a profound peace, and looks upon everybody as a bunch of manure.
author: Moliere
